entries.band_flourish_off: You are no longer accepting Band Flourishes.
entries.band_flourish_on: You will now accept Band Flourishes.
entries.band_flourish_status_off: You are currently not accepting Band Flourishes.
entries.band_flourish_status_on: You are currently accepting Band Flourishes.
entries.buff_invalid_target_self: The player name you specified was not recognized.
entries.buff_time_failed: You must listen or watch a performer for at least 2 minutes in order to gain the entertainer buffs.
entries.cc_no_funds: You do not have enough funds to pay the cover charge.
entries.cc_no_skill: You do not have the skill to use this ability.
entries.cc_query1: This performer has set a cover charge of
entries.cc_query2: credits. Will you pay this fee?
entries.cc_set_prompt: Enter the number of credits that you want to charge:
entries.cc_start_charge: You are now charging a cover of %DI credit(s).
entries.cc_stop_charge: You are no longer charging a cover.
entries.dance_fail: You are unable to do that at this time.
entries.dance_lack_skill_self: You do not have the skill to perform the dance.
entries.dance_must_be_performing_self: You must be dancing before you can change the dance.
entries.dance_no_dance_param: What dance do you wish to perform?
entries.dance_too_tired: You are too tired to continue dancing.
entries.dance_unknown_self: You do not know that dance.
entries.dance_watch_out_of_range: You stop watching %TT because %OT is too far away.
entries.deny_cant_pay_cover: You have been denied service by this entertainer and are not allowed to pay the set cover charge.
entries.deny_service_add_other: You have been added to %TU's Denial of Service list.
entries.deny_service_add_self: You have added %TT to your Denial of Service list.
entries.deny_service_cover_charge: You cannot deny service to someone that has paid a cover charge.
entries.deny_service_remove_other: You have been removed from %TU's Denial of Service list.
entries.deny_service_remove_self: You have removed %TT from your Denial of Service list.
entries.effect_lack_skill_self: You lack the skill to execute this special effect.
entries.effect_level_too_high: You specified a level for this special effect that is above your current skill level.  Attempting to execute a lower level effect.
entries.effect_need_target: This special effect requires an active target to execute.
entries.effect_not_performing: You must be performing in order to execute this special effect.
entries.effect_not_performing_correct: You are not using the correct performance skill to execute this special effect.
entries.effect_perform_center_stage: You execute a Center Stage effect.
entries.effect_perform_color_lights: You execute a Colored Lights effect.
entries.effect_perform_color_swirl: You execute a Colored Swirl effect.
entries.effect_perform_dance_floor: You execute a Dance Floor effect.
entries.effect_perform_featured_solo: You execute a Featured Solo effect.
entries.effect_perform_fire_jets: You execute a Fire Jet effect.
entries.effect_perform_fire_jets_2: You execute a Fire Jet 2 effect.
entries.effect_perform_laser_show: You execute a Laser Show effect.
entries.effect_perform_smoke_bomb: You execute a Smoke Bomb effect.
entries.effect_perform_spot_light: You execute a Spot Light effect.
entries.effect_too_tired: You are too tired to execute this special effect.
entries.effect_wait_self: You must wait before you can perform another special effect.
entries.flourish_instrument_unknown: You specified an unknown instrument for a band flourish.
entries.flourish_not_performing: You must be playing music or dancing in order to perform a flourish.
entries.flourish_not_valid: That is not a valid flourish.
entries.flourish_too_tired: You are too tired to perform a flourish.
entries.flourish_wait_self: You must wait before you can perform another flourish.
entries.insp_buff_must_listen: You cannot inspire that person because they are not listening to you.
entries.insp_buff_must_perform: You must be performing in order to inspire someone.
entries.insp_buff_must_watch: You cannot inspire that person because they are not watching you.
entries.inspire_menu_prompt2: .Choose the inspiration enhancement that you want to apply to this patron.
entries.music_band_join_song_members: %TU prepares your band to join in with the currently playing song.
entries.music_band_join_song_self: You prepare the band to join in with the currently performed song.
entries.music_fail: You are unable to do that at this time.
entries.music_invalid_song: That is not a valid song name.
entries.music_join_band_self: You join with the band in the currently playing song.
entries.music_join_band_stop: You must play the same song as the band.
entries.music_lack_skill_band_member: One of the band members lacked the skill to perform that song.
entries.music_lack_skill_instrument: You do not have the skill to use the currently equipped instrument.
entries.music_lack_skill_song_band: You do not have the skill to perform the song the band is performing.
entries.music_lack_skill_song_self: You do not have the skill to perform that song.
entries.music_listen_out_of_range: You stop listening to %TT because %OT is too far away.
entries.music_listen_playing_self: You must stop playing to listen.
entries.music_must_be_performing_self: You must be playing music before you can change the song.
entries.music_must_match_band: You cannot change your song now.  You must play the same song as the band.
entries.music_must_unequip: You must unequip your current instrument in order to play another.
entries.music_no_instrument: You must have an instrument equipped to play music.
entries.music_no_music_param: What song do you wish to play?
entries.music_not_performing: You are not currently playing a song.
entries.music_out_of_power: Your droid is low on power and can no longer continue playing.
entries.music_outro_wait: You must wait a moment before starting another song.
entries.music_prepare_stop_band_self: You prepare to stop the band.
entries.music_start_band_members: %TU prepares to start your band playing.
entries.music_start_band_self: You prepare to start the band playing.
entries.music_still_playing: You cannot start the music while a band member is still playing.
entries.music_too_tired: You are too tired to continue playing music.
entries.music_track_not_available: Your droid does not have a track recorded for the current song in progress.
entries.perform_inspire_building: Your inspiration buff has increased to %DI minutes.
entries.perform_inspire_crafting_bonus: Your crafting success chance has been increased by your inspiration.
entries.perform_inspire_faction_bonus: You have received a 10% faction bonus due to your inspiration.
entries.perform_inspire_max: You have reached maximum duration on your inspiration.
entries.perform_inspire_xp_bonus: You have received a 10% experience bonus due to your inspiration.
entries.performance_delay: You must wait %DI seconds after stopping before you can begin entertaining again.
entries.select_juggs: Select a juggling act to perform.
entries.music_too_far_away: You are too far away from that instrument.
entries.music_hologram_no_instrument: Your Holographic backup image has no instrument.
entries.inspire_invalid_target: That is an invalid target for inspiration.
entries.band_pause_format: Format: /bandPause <all> - Pauses all Band Members Format: /bandPause <instrument> - Pauses All Specified Instruments In Band
entries.dance_group_off: You turn group dancing off.  You will not be affected by other entertainers grouped with you that issue start/stop dance commands.
entries.dance_group_on: You turn group dancing on.  You will be affected by other entertainers grouped with you that issue start/stop dance commands.
